mean_cn: n. 绿锈，光亮的外表，神态，圣餐盘
mean_en: a thin usually green layer that forms naturally on the metals copper and bronze when they are exposed to the air for a long time
short_phrase: a green patina on the bells
sentence: The brass bells had been outdoors long enough to acquire a green patina.
sentence_trans: 铜钟已经放在户外很长时间了以至于都生绿锈了。
